Package com.game.wall

Class Crack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.game.wall.Crack
  • public class Crack
extends Object
    Class that generates the crack across the face of certain bricks.

        Method that makes a crack based on the direction of impact and the point of impact.

        direction - Direction of the impact.

        end - End point of the crack.
